SEARCH
Package gw.cc.system.transaction

Class InvoiceAutomaticProcessor

java.lang.Object
gw.cc.system.transaction.InvoiceAutomaticProcessor
public class InvoiceAutomaticProcessor extends Object
Runs the helpers specified by the IInvoiceAutoProcessingPlugin against a supplied set of ServiceRequestInvoices. Each helper is run in a new bundle that is committed afterward.

  • Constructor Summary

    Create a new processor to handle invoices.

  • Constructor Details

    • InvoiceAutomaticProcessor

      public InvoiceAutomaticProcessor()
      Create a new processor to handle invoices. By default it uses the set of helpers specified by the plugin (see getPlugin()) and refreshes each invoice after it is updated (see isRefreshUpdatedBeans()).

  • Method Details

    • getLogger

      public static boolean isPluginEnabled()

    • processForPlugin

      public static void processForPlugin(Bundle outerBundle)
      Finds all of the ServiceRequestInvoices in the supplied bundle and auto-processes them. It refreshes the entire bundle after each update so that subsequent helpers can see the newest state.
      Parameters:
      outerBundle -

    • process

      public void process(ServiceRequestInvoice invoice)
      Invokes the helpers specified in IInvoiceAutoProcessingPlugin on the supplied invoice.
      Parameters:
      invoice -

    • process

      public void process(List<ServiceRequestInvoice> allInvoices)
      Invokes the helpers specified in IInvoiceAutoProcessingPlugin on the supplied invoices. Each helper is run in an individual bundle.
      Parameters:
      allInvoices -

    • updateInvoice

      protected boolean updateInvoice(InvoiceAutomaticStateTransitionHelper transitionHelper, ServiceRequestInvoice invoice, InvoiceAutomaticProcessingQualificationCheckResult qualificationResult)
      Asks the helper to update the invoice in a new bundle given the supplied qualification result.

      If the plugin throws a Validation exception this method catches it and extracts the user error messages. For other types of Exceptions the helper is asked to provide the error message using InvoiceAutomaticStateTransitionHelper.getSpecificFailedToQualifyReasonsForException(Throwable)). This method then begins a second bundle, in which it asks the helper to record those user error messages.

      Parameters:
      invoice - The invoice to which the update will be applied
      qualificationResult - The result of the helper qualification test
      Returns:
      true if changes were committed to the database, false otherwise

    • isRefreshUpdatedBeans

      public boolean isRefreshUpdatedBeans()
      Returns:
      true if the processor will #refresh() any beans that are changed (thus ensuring later helpers and the original caller see the latest state).

    • setRefreshUpdatedBeans

      public void setRefreshUpdatedBeans(boolean refreshUpdatedBeans)
      If true (the default) the processor will #refresh() any beans that are changed (thus ensuring later helpers and the original caller see the latest state). Set to false if you want the caller to decide when and whether to refresh them.
      Parameters:
      refreshUpdatedBeans -

    • getOnUpdate

      public Runnable getOnUpdate()
      Returns:
      the code that will be run after an invoice is updated.

      Set the code that will be run after an invoice is updated.
      Parameters:
      onUpdate -
